before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"71pcd","text":"Starting specimens:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qpee","text":"Starting samples = FFPE tissues cut to 4 micron thickness and adhered to positively-charged microscopy slides (e.g. SuperFrost Plus Slides; Fisher Scientific 12-550-15). It is crucial that tissues are adequately fixed to prevent tissue degradation but not over-fixed as to over-fragment RNA. Tissues no thicker than 0.5 centimeters should be freshly harvested and placed into 10% neutral-buffered formalin (NBF) or 4% paraformaldehyde (PFA) at a ratio of at least 20 volumes fixative per one volume tissue. Tissues should be fixed for between 16-30 hours at room temperature (RT), followed by immediate transfer to 70% ethanol and processing into FFPE tissue blocks. Fixation times should be optimized for individual tissues and experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

controls:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7tdej","text":"oNegative control (primary antibody only)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ma7r","text":"§This slide receives 0.05% PBS-T in place of secondary antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8heo","text":"oBatch control ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhmlg","text":"§If performing staining across multiple batches, include serial sections of one tissue in each batch","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"er3rf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"459bk","text":"Assay NBF (Cancer Diagnostics, Inc. 111) or 4% PFA (Electron Microscopy Sciences 15713)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jqs6","text":"ImmEdge status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7n001","text":"Before starting the assay: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18pok","text":"Preheat a dry oven to 60℃ ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a428p","text":"Load slides for assay into vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4bu2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ar42p","text":"Baking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26bp0","text":"Bake slides 20 min 60℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74ujh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arjk1","text":"While slides bake:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bils4","text":"Prepare 0.05% PBS-T (can store at RT up to 1 month)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fg21q","text":"Immediately before deparaffinizing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa521","text":"Add ~200 mL xylenes to each of three clearing agent dishes in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23l8g","text":"Add ~200 mL 100% ethanol to each of two staining dishes in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rlvj","text":"Add ~200 mL 95% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q0be","text":"Add ~200 mL 85% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jhe5","text":"Add ~200 mL 70% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddj4m","text":"Add ~200 mL distilled water to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tau8","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr2kc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5935n","text":"Deparaffinizing \u0026 Rehydrating","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6oqh9","text":"Submerge slide in fresh xylenes 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4b5p0","text":"Submerge slide in fresh xylenes 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2869q","text":"Submerge slide in fresh xylenes 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cid83","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hrqq","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9trr","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 95% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6sm1","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 85% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i66r","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 70% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hsq4","text":"Submerge slides in fresh distilled water 3 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"279nj","text":"Submerge slides in fresh PBS-T for transport","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85c7j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqn2s","text":"While slides deparaffinize/rehydrate:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3csoc","text":"Turn off dry oven","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9th8","text":"Prepare 1X Co-Detection Target Retrieval solution by adding 1 bottle (70 mL) Co-Detection Target Retrieval Reagent (10X stock concentration) to 630 mL distilled water (can store at 4℃ up to 1 month)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a13r6","text":"Prepare steamer:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8kot","text":"---------- Fill the bottom reservoir of steamer to the ‘Fill’ line","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ihgu","text":"---------- Assemble the steamer, using both tiers of steam bowls. Do not place the divider between steam bowls, as an extra tall compartment is needed","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q7sj","text":"---------- Pour 200 mL prepared Co-Detection Target Retrieval solution into staining dish and place into the steamer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akjc5","text":"Preheat the prepared steamer, programmed for 1 hour","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86luu","text":"---------- Perform this step ~25 minutes before use so that retrieval solution can adequately heat to ~110℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7jk1i","text":"Heat-Induced Epitope Retrieval","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fecp9","text":"Leave slides in PBS-T at RT until steamer is preheated (retrieval solution reaches ~110℃)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50fep","text":"Once steamer has preheated, submerge slide rack in preheated 1X Co-detection Target Retrieval solution 20 min ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":51,"length":59}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25rar","text":"---------- Slides should be maintained at ~110℃ for the duration of target retrieval. To ensure temperature is not reduced, open steamer lid, load slides, and shut steamer lid as quickly as possible.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6g6","text":"Remove slides from steamer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bius","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jttd","text":"Leave slides in PBS-T","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cfpt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tctj","text":"While slides incubate in 1X co-detection target retrieval solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ep0e3","text":"Discard deparaffinizing \u0026 rehydrating reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"doqfe","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to one staining dish","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btv2j","text":"Prepare humidified slide staining tray by adding water to bottom \u0026 placing lid on top","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fu3l","text":"Hydrophobic Barrier","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53ui6","text":"Apply hydrophobic barrier around each tissue","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eb9e9","text":"---------- One by one, unload slides from vertical rack submerged in PBS-T. Dry off only the area around the tissue where a barrier will be drawn with a hydrophobic barrier pen. Keep tissue area wet the whole time. Draw barrier and place slide flat in the slide staining tray. Using a pipette, apply a small amount of PBS-T within the barrier (just enough to keep the tissue wet while drawing barriers on remaining slides)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1r69","text":"Leave slides in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11hgc","text":"Tissue Quenching ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbflb","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"903qs","text":"Incubate with Dual Endogenous Enzyme Block 10 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6tph","text":"---------- Invert bottle immediately before use; apply drops to completely cover tissues; let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i50d","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q4eu","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ankla","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an398","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3as3","text":"While slides incubate with enzyme block:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6984e","text":"Turn off steamer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ni4v","text":"Discard epitope retrieval reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"731mq","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"btqul","text":"Protein Blocking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jake","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lite","text":"Incubate with Protein Block 20 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"af33p","text":"---------- Invert bottle immediately before use; apply drops to completely cover tissues; let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hi9p","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"848nq","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66kgt","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am138","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qip9","text":"While slides incubate with protein block:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkchu","text":"Discard tissue quenching reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p6ej","text":"Prepare primary antibody by adding anti-Blimp1 antibody to Co-Detection Antibody Diluent at a dilution of 25 ug/mL (1:8 dilution if stock antibody concentration is 200 ug/mL). Total volume to use is dependent on tissue sizes. Make sure to mix reagents before pipetting.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aafui","text":"Primary Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61ic0","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dddvv","text":"Incubate with diluted primary antibody overnight at 4℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60ed9","text":"---------- Apply drops to completely cover tissues; let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2hhq","text":"Remove slides from slide staining tray, decant, and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"t9of","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmbco","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jehf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4ffk","text":"While slides are incubating with primary antibody:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66v91","text":"Discard protein blocking reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12jj6","text":"The next day:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crnrm","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ac6e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"337b3","text":"Secondary Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c683p","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mr61","text":"Incubate with anti-mouse HRP polymer 30 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fj036","text":"---------- Invert bottle immediately before use; apply drops to completely cover tissues; let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7fps","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dsvl","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fr32","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3v6pv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24o93","text":"While slides are incubating with secondary antibody:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e02uo","text":"Discard remaining primary antibody reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6567f","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3levt","text":"Immediately before chromogen detection:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ata6e","text":"Prepare diluted DAB chromogen by adding 1 drop DAB substrate per 1 mL substrate buffer. Total volume to use is dependent on tissue sizes. Make sure to mix reagents thoroughly. Store in the dark due to light sensitivity","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54m21","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fej46","text":"Chromogen Detection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9lrq","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8a2mr","text":"Incubate with diluted DAB chromogen 7 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f016j","text":"---------- Pipette well to mix immediately before use; pipette appropriate volumes to completely cover tissues \u0026 let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm819","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vh23","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6aute","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rg5k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7usqf","text":"While slides are incubating with DAB chromogen:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7402f","text":"Discard secondary antibody reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mjs1","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2uilb","text":"Add ~200 mL 25% hematoxylin to one staining dish","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2he4p","text":"---------- Prepare by combining 150 mL distilled water with 50 mL Gill’s Hematoxylin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf54b","text":"Add ~200 mL distilled water to each of three staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ph57","text":"Add ~200 mL 95% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s7iq","text":"Add ~200 mL 100% ethanol to each of three staining dishes in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9996","text":"Add ~200 mL Pro-Par to each of three clearing agent dishes in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjumq","text":"Counterstaining","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cue64","text":"Submerge slide rack in diluted hematoxylin 15 sec RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7f82n","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4da51","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88ic7","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1rd0d","text":"Mounting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k5bh","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 95% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11uai","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gbot","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1p6u1","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4plo3","text":"Submerge slides in fresh Pro-Par 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7n0fu","text":"Submerge slides in fresh Pro-Par 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v62c","text":"Submerge slides in fresh Pro-Par 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qljg","text":"Mount slides by adding 2-4 drops of mounting media to each slide, followed by application of a cover glass. Remove bubbles from tissue by applying pressure to cover glass","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg12r","text":"Place slides flat in a dry, dark space to air dry at RT overnight","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sp3","text":"Assess staining with a bright-field microscope","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tbtd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqir9","text":"While slides are air drying:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9voda","text":"Discard chromogen detection and counterstaining reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
